comments: Test covering the generic use of system column names

tests.name: should fail if ROWKEY used as column name
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (x int) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT x AS rowkey FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: 'ROWKEY' is a reserved column name. You cannot use it as an alias for a column.
